servinfo.title: 4WD Control Symptom Diagnosis
servinfo.ptxt: Diagnose transfer assembly after performing the following inspections.

s1.ptxt: Perform 4WD control system check referring to 4WD Control System Check .
Confirm 4WD control system operation referring to 4WD Control System Operation

condition.ptxt: Transfer does not operate (Transfer position indicator does not operate)

action.ptxt: Check switch referring to Transfer Switch Inspection .
Check transfer shift actuator referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .

ps.ptxt: 4L/N switch and/or switch center differential lock switch faulty

action.ptxt: Check switch referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .
Check CPP switch referring to Clutch Pedal Position (CPP) Switch Inspection and Adjustment .
Repair as necessary.
Check 4WD control module referring to Inspection of 4WD Control Module and Its Circuits .

condition.ptxt: Transfer refuses to operate (Transfer position indicator flashes, and then transfer does not shift)

action.ptxt: Check transfer shift actuator referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .

ps.ptxt: 4L/N switch and/or center differential lock switch faulty

action.ptxt: Check switch referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Distorted control cover shift shaft or shift fork

action.ptxt: Check shift fork referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Weakened control cover shift shaft spring

action.ptxt: Check spring referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Distorted or dispositioned control cover shift shaft snap ring and washer

action.ptxt: Check snap ring and washer referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Worn chamfered tooth on sleeve or gear

action.ptxt: Check chamfered tooth and gear referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .
Repair as necessary.
Check 4WD control module referring to Inspection of 4WD Control Module and Its Circuits .
Check control cover shift shaft referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .
Check shift fork or sleeve referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Weak or damaged control cover shift shaft spring

action.ptxt: Check spring referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Worn bearings on input gear or counter gear

action.ptxt: Check bearing referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Worn chamfered tooth on sleeve or gear

action.ptxt: Check sleeve and gear referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .
Check circlip(s) referring to Transfer Assembly Inspection .
Refer to Transfer Assembly Inspection .
Refer to Transfer Assembly Inspection .

ps.ptxt: Damaged or worn chamfered tooth on sleeve or gear

action.ptxt: Refer to Transfer Assembly Inspection .
